title: Visible wards put from Greater Vision Totem(visible) doesn't show correctly
body:
I tested this in custom mode, when I use trinket{{item:3362}}  to put a visible ward(others is fine), it turns into other wards. I mean the skin.
the Default one turns into the Haunting Ward
the Snowman ward run into  the Tomb Angel Ward
I only have this so that all I know. Thought it does not affect the game, but please fix it.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're working to fix it!
